verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, 'When you <S%H5927>mount<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%> will <S%H215>give<s%> <S%H215>light<s%> in the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand.<s%>'"

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> therefore <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so;<s%> he <S%H5927>mounted<s%> its <S%H5216>lamps<s%> at the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Now <S%H2088>this<s%> was the <S%H4639>workmanship<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand,<s%> <S%H4749>hammered<s%> <S%H4749>work<s%> of <S%H2091>gold;<s%> from its <S%H3409>base<s%> to its <S%H6525>flowers,<s%> it was <S%H4749>hammered<s%> <S%H4749>work;<s%> according to the <S%H4758>pattern<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4501>lampstand.<s%>
Again the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H3947>"Take<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them.

"And <S%H3541>thus<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to them, for their <S%H2891>cleansing:<s%> [sprinkle] <S%H2891>purifying<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> on them, and let them <S%H5674>use<s%> a <S%H8593>razor<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1320>body,<s%> and <S%H3526>wash<s%> their <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and they shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

"Then let them <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> with its grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil;<s%> and a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering.<s%>

"So you shall <S%H7126>present<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%> You shall also <S%H6950>assemble<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

and <S%H7126>present<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

<S%H175>"Aaron<s%> then shall <S%H5130>present<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> as a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they may <S%H1961>qualify<s%> to <S%H5647>perform<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"Now the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H6499>bulls;<s%> then <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

"And you shall have the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> so as to <S%H5130>present<s%> them as a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
"Thus you shall <S%H914>separate<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall be Mine.

"Then <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> may <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%> But you shall <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them and <S%H5130>present<s%> them as a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering;<s%>

for they are <S%H5414>wholly<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> to Me from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> I have <S%H3947>taken<s%> them for Myself <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9450>first<s%> <S%H9450>issue<s%> of the womb, the first-born of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"For <S%H3605>every<s%> first-born among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is Mine, among the <S%H120>men<s%> and among the <S%H929>animals;<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> them for Myself.
"But I have <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> first-born among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"And I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> as a <S%H5414>gift<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H5647>perform<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on <S%H5921>behalf<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that there may be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5063>plague<s%> among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by their <S%H5066>coming<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>"

Thus <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites;<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> concerning the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to them.

The <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> too, <S%H2398>purified<s%> themselves from <S%H2398>sin<s%> and <S%H3526>washed<s%> their <S%H899>clothes;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5130>presented<s%> them as a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> also <S%H3722>made<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them.

Then <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in to <S%H5647>perform<s%> their <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H1121>sons;<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H6213>did<s%> to them.
Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> is <S%H834>what<s%> [applies] to the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> from twenty-five <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> they shall <S%H935>enter<s%> to <S%H6633>perform<s%> <S%H6635>service<s%> in the <S%H5656>work<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

"But at the <S%H1121>age<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> they shall <S%H7725>retire<s%> from <S%H6635>service<s%> in the <S%H5656>work<s%> and not <S%H5647>work<s%> <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>

"They may, however, <S%H8334>assist<s%> their <S%H251>brothers<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> an <S%H4931>obligation;<s%> but they [themselves] shall <S%H5647>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5656>work.<s%> <S%H3602>Thus<s%> you shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> concerning their <S%H4931>obligations.<s%>"
